title: IDatumTag.GetDisplayStyle
description: Gets the display style of this datum tag.
returns: Display style as defined in swDatumDisplayType_e (see Remarks )
remarks: This method does not return swDatumDisplayType_Default if the datum tag is set to use the document default setting. Instead, either swDatumDisplayType_Roundgb or swDatumDisplayType_Square is returned.
